item.title: Carrie add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "All families are psychotic. Everybody has basically the same family - it's just reconfigured slightly different from one to the next." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Carrie add a quote by Isaac Asimov
item.description: "If knowledge can create problems, it is not through ignorance that we can solve them." -- Isaac Asimov

item.title: Carrie add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "We are what we pretend to be, so we must be careful about what we pretend to be." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Carrie add a quote by Dave Eggers
item.description: "Still though, I think if you're not self-obsessed, you're probably boring." -- Dave Eggers

item.title: Carrie add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "It's like Tolstoy said. Happiness is an allegory, unhappiness a <i>story</i>." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Carrie add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "I started inventing things, and then I couldn't stop, like beavers, which I know about. People think they cut down trees so they can build dams, but in reality it's because their teeth never stop growing, and if they didn't constantly file them down by cutting through all of those trees, their teeth would start to grow into their own faces, which would kill them. That's how my brain was." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Carrie add a quote by Carlos Ruiz Zafon
item.description: "Once, in my father's bookshop, I heard a regular customer say that few things leave a deeper mark on a reader than the first book that finds its way into his heart. Those first images, the echo of words we think we have left behind, accompany us throughout our lives and sculpt a palace in our memory to which, sooner or later—no matter how many books we read, how many worlds we discover, or how much we learn or forget—we will return." -- Carlos Ruiz Zafon

item.title: Carrie add a quote by John August
item.description: "A little nonsense now and then, Is cherished by the wisest men." -- John August

item.title: Carrie add a quote by William Faulkner
item.description: "Wonder. Go on and wonder." -- William Faulkner

item.title: Carrie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde
